mapper.sql: a.proc_sno AS "procSno", a.chengbanren AS "chengbanren", a.chengbanbumen AS "chengbanbumen", a.sxmc AS "sxmc", a.miji AS "miji", a.ydbmqx AS "ydbmqx", a.zhixifanwei AS "zhixifanwei", a.tuomichuliliyou AS "tuomichuliliyou", a.tmclyj AS "tmclyj", a.beizhu AS "beizhu", a.chengbanrenid AS "chengbanrenid", a.chengbanbumenid AS "chengbanbumenid", a.sxmcid AS "sxmcid", a.id AS "id", a.form_id AS "formId", a.data_secret_level AS "dataSecretLevel", a.version AS "version", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_by_dept AS "createByDept.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO efm_jueltygvaw( proc_sno, chengbanren, chengbanbumen, sxmc, miji, ydbmqx, zhixifanwei, tuomichuliliyou, tmclyj, beizhu, chengbanrenid, chengbanbumenid, sxmcid, id, form_id, data_secret_level, version, create_by, create_by_dept, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{procSno}, #{chengbanren}, #{chengbanbumen}, #{sxmc}, #{miji}, #{ydbmqx}, #{zhixifanwei}, #{tuomichuliliyou}, #{tmclyj}, #{beizhu}, #{chengbanrenid}, #{chengbanbumenid}, #{sxmcid}, #{id}, #{formId}, #{dataSecretLevel}, #{version}, #{createBy.id}, #{createByDept.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE efm_jueltygvaw SET proc_sno = #{procSno}, chengbanren = #{chengbanren}, chengbanbumen = #{chengbanbumen}, sxmc = #{sxmc}, miji = #{miji}, ydbmqx = #{ydbmqx}, zhixifanwei = #{zhixifanwei}, tuomichuliliyou = #{tuomichuliliyou}, tmclyj = #{tmclyj}, beizhu = #{beizhu}, chengbanrenid = #{chengbanrenid}, chengbanbumenid = #{chengbanbumenid}, sxmcid = #{sxmcid}, form_id = #{formId}, data_secret_level = #{dataSecretLevel}, version = #{version}, create_by_dept = #{createByDept.id}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
